title: (1) Note :- 1) In case of Regulation No
clause_text: (1) Note :- 1) In case of Regulation No.7.8.2 and 7.8.3, no premium shall be chargeable in areas of Planning Authorities, if they are covered under Vidarbha, Marathwada, Dhule, Nandurbar, Ratnagiri and Sindhudurg Districts and no Industry Districts and Naxalism affected areas of the State (as defined in the "Package Scheme of Incentives-2013" of the Industries, Energy & Labour Department of the State.)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
